description: Ensure documents include heading elements to convey structure.
recommendation: Add meaningful heading elements (h1-h6) to structure the content. (WCAG 2.1 SC 1.3.1,1.3.2,2.4.6)
algorithm: Flags documents with no heading tags (h1-h6) present.
algorithm_advanced: Checks DOM or regex for any h1-h6 tags; reports when none exist.
